Module io.github.tonywasher.joceanus.tethys.core
Package io.github.tonywasher.joceanus.tethys.core.button

Class TethysUICoreScrollButtonManager<T>

java.lang.Object
io.github.tonywasher.joceanus.tethys.core.base.TethysUICoreComponent
io.github.tonywasher.joceanus.tethys.core.button.TethysUICoreScrollButtonManager<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the object type
All Implemented Interfaces:
OceanusEventRegistrar.OceanusEventProvider<TethysUIEvent>, TethysUIComponent, TethysUIScrollButtonManager<T>, TethysUIControl.TethysUIScrollButton<T>
public abstract class TethysUICoreScrollButtonManager<T> extends TethysUICoreComponent implements TethysUIScrollButtonManager<T>
ScrollButton Manager.

Provides the following events.

NEWVALUE
fired when a new value is selected.
Detail is new value
EDITFOCUSLOST
fired when the dialog is cancelled without a value being selected.
